title: Holy crap, who put the instant feedback system onto 'Hitler mode'?
body:
I got a chat restriction for making a simple joke to a friend. It wasn't even offensive, it could just be taken as such if you were ignorant.

Also, when is calling someone 'awful at jungling' worthy of a 25 game chat restriction?

WTF is this nonsense, Riot.

replies.body: My friend got a two week ban for telling saying "I'm not toxic you're the one who's been calling people %%%s". He said that word %%%, instant two week ban. But when someone is insulting their team in all chat, saying everything but the words that trip the ban hammer, they get away with it. Every ban that is more than a chat restriction should be checked by a real person, it would take less than 2 minutes per chatlog.

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey Max,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Yx9O1jBj,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-12-16T07:50:53.014+0000)

But when someone is insulting their team in all chat, saying everything but the words that trip the ban hammer, they get away with it. Every ban that is more than a chat restriction should be checked by a real person, it would take less than 2 minutes per chatlog.

that is the real problem when relying on automation for something like this. context is thrown out the window. I got done for asking an opposing player whether they meant to say "g o 0 k" (I always report for racism but wanted to make sure I understood whether they were being intentionally racist or if it was a mistype). Riot said that was the reason, I challenged, they agreed that context was ignored and that I didnt say it to be offensive, suspension upheld and got some free attitude with my slap in the face. full disclosure I said neck yourself in the same game but the reason player behaviour gave me for the suspension was racism when they later agreed I was clearly not being racist.

lol, considering i lost my diamond border due to saying a joke in a NORMS game and getting INSTABANNED for it, i feel the pain. reported several players in RANKED for actually telling people to k**-themselves and meaning it, nope no bans no restrictions, living their lowly pathetic life with rewards. the tribunal is pathetic in deducing who is innocent and who should be punished
The bans being handed out right now are a complete joke. The bigger joke is how riot are handling support tickets on unreasonable bans.
idk but i got permabanned for calling my mate a 'shitkid'
Provide the chat logs and be judged.
